price: And [remember] Lot, when he said to his people, “Do you commit this shameful act[17] while seeing [one another][18]?
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ
footnotes:
[17] i.e., sodomy.
 [18] i.e., publicly, or while you are aware [that it is wrong].
